item.title: EVO 2025 title lineup announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/evo-2025-title-lineup-announced

Introducing the new extended lineup.

The Evolution Championship Series has announced the official title lineup for EVO 2025, which will run from August 1 to 3 at Las Vegas Convention Center West Hill in Las Vegas, Nevada.

The official title lineup is as follows:

  • Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves (first appearance at EVO)
  • Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising (second appearance at EVO)
  • Guilty Gear: Strive (fourth appearance at EVO)
  • Marvel vs. Capcom 2: New Age of Heroes (10th appearance at EVO)
  • Mortal Kombat 1 (second appearance at EVO)
  • Street Fighter 6 (third appearance at EVO)
  • Tekken 8 (second appearance at EVO)
  • Under Night In-Birth II Sys:Celes (second appearance at EVO)

The extended lineup (tournaments run by EVO, that take place on EVO stages, showcased on EVO streams, and earning EVO medals for the top eight) includes:

  • BlazBlue: Central Fiction
  • Killer Instinct
  • The King of Fighters XV
  • Rivals of Aether II
  • Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O.
  • ???
  • ???
  • â€¦and more!

Registration for EVO 2025 is available now at evo.gg.
